name: world ocean
description:
made in one week for summer procjam 2018

explore an infinite procedural world with your boat

art, design, and code by @lycaontalks/@lycaon@dev.glitch.social

font is 'monogram' by datagoblin

made with the help of flashback '94 and super text mesh

note: there is a bug where on some resolutions/aspect ratios, the play button will fail to render. it's there, just click above "options" and it'll work right.

also note: the linux version has not been tested so if you run into issues just let me know ok?

also also note: screenshots appear in the folder ending in _Data for your platform in the same directory as the game executable
